TestDescription.name: IBM Tivoli Access Manager directory traversal
TestDescription.Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in WebSEAL in IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business 5.1 before 5.1.0.39-TIV-AWS-IF0040, 6.0 before 6.0.0.25-TIV-AWS-IF0026, 6.1.0 before 6.1.0.5-TIV-AWS-IF0006, and 6.1.1 before 6.1.1-TIV-AWS-FP0001 has unspecified impact and attack vectors.[break][break] Directory traversal vulnerability in WebSEAL in IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business 6.1.1 before 6.1.1-TIV-AWS-FP0001 on AIX allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a %uff0e%uff0e (encoded dot dot) in a URI.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can read arbitrary files.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Update to the latest version of IBM Tivoli Access Manager.
